name: Nyaromon
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] If you have a yellow Digimon in play, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.) If you do, trash 1 card in your hand.

name: Salamon
digivolveEffect: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand by paying its DNA digivolve cost.

name: Gatomon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 yellow Digimon card and 1 purple Digimon card among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.[Your Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve into a card with [Archangel] or [Fallen Angel] in its traits, reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 2.
digivolveEffect: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand by paying its DNA digivolve cost.

name: Angewomon
effect: [On Play] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gains ＜Security Attack -2＞ until the end of your opponent's next turn. (This Digimon checks 2 fewer security cards.)
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While you have a purple Digimon in play, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)

name: Mastemon
effect: ＜DNA Digivolution: 0 from yellow Lv.5 + purple Lv.5＞ Digivolve unsuspended with the 2 specified Digimon stacked on top of each other. [When Digivolving] Place 1 yellow or purple Digimon card from your trash on top of your security stack face down. When DNA digivolving, you may search your security stack for 1 level 5 or lower Digimon card and play it without paying its memory cost. Then, shuffle your security stack. [All Turns] When you play another Digimon using an effect, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon whose level is less than or equal to the played Digimon's level.

name: Ghostmon
effect: [Opponent's Turn] While you have a yellow Digimon in play, this Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞. (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)

name: Tsukaimon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Angel], [Archangel], or [Fallen Angel] in its traits among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Witchmon
effect: [Security] At the end of the battle, play this card without paying its memory cost.[On Play] Return 1 purple level 5 or lower Digimon card from your trash to your hand.

name: Bastemon
effect: [On Play] Delete 1 of your opponent's level 3 Digimon.

name: LadyDevimon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may trash 1 card in your hand to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 yellow and 1 purple card with [Angel], [Archangel], or [Fallen Angel] in their traits among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] All of your yellow Digimon gain ＜Retaliation＞. (When this Digimon is deleted after losing a battle, delete the Digimon it was battling.)

name: Junomon
effect: ＜Retaliation＞ (When this Digimon is deleted after losing a battle, delete the Digimon it was battling.)[When Digivolving] Trash the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, return 1 Digimon card from your trash to your hand.

name: Chaos Degradation
effect: [Main] Place 1 of your opponent's Digimon face down at the top or bottom of your opponent's security stack. If you do, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.
securityEffect: [Security] You may place 1 of your opponent's Digimon face down at the top or bottom of its owner's security stack.

name: Darkness Wave
effect: [Main] Trash the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, if you have a yellow Digimon in play, return 1 yellow or purple Digimon card from your trash to your hand.
